an10.195:4.1: “I will teach you the principle to develop and the principle not to develop. …
an10.195:4.2: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.
an10.195:4.3: And what is the principle not to develop?
an10.195:4.6: This is called the principle not to develop.
an10.195:5.1: And what is the principle to develop?
an10.195:5.4: This is called the principle to develop.”
